Uses of Package
community.leaf.textchain.adventure

  • Classes in community.leaf.textchain.adventure used by community.leaf.textchain.adventure
    Class
    Description
    Chain
    Abstract text chain.
    ChainConstructor
    Standard chain constructor: takes a WrappedTextComponentBuilder and creates a new chain instance.
    ChainedAudienceSender
    Sends components to an audience.
    ChainedRecipientSender
    Sends components to a recipient by first converting it to an audience.
    ChainSource
    Generates standard chain constructors.
    ItemRarity
    Represents an item's rarity.
    LegacyTextChain
    A text chain that will automatically process legacy ampersand-style color codes in text (like "&3&o").
    TextChain
    The de facto standard chain, and also a factory: all chains ultimately start here.
    TextProcessor
    Converts a string into a text component.
    WrappedTextComponentBuilder
    Contains text component builders for modification and eventual component generation and caching.
